name: Kitsu
description:
A very short story about saying goodbye...

Help Kitsu on his way back to say goodbye to a friend.

KEYBOARD PLAYERS: In case you are in doubt, the "O" button is the Z or C key and the "X", well, that one is the X or V key.

This game was made for the A Game By Its Cover jam, an annual game jam about turning the fictional cartridge art of the My Famicase Exhibition into the real thing. We chose きつねDEコン！ (Fox-Match!) cover by Suzuki Tokichi as inspiration.

Credits

Game Design by Fáyer & Pato

Code by Fáyer

Art & Words by Pato

Level Design by Pato
